name: Synthia 2: Revenge of the ID
overview: Four years after saving her creator and escaping base Omega, Synthia learns of a group of pre-war survivors in stasis, held hostage by an insane military artificial intelligence. Synthia must infiltrate the GOD complex, overcome the ID and free the sleeping survivors. Only then human kind and indeed cyber kind have a realistic chance in prospering survival. If Synthia fails, we are all doomed ... If Synthia succeeds, you will be awarded a pass code for the finale (Which must be loaded in separately). Guide Synthia around the mines picking up various objects and solving clues on the way. Each object you pick up can help you progress further into the game. Locate a flashing ? and click fire on the ? symbol to see whether or not your clue has been solved.
